name: Machamp
flavorText:
Using its heavy
muscles, it throws
powerful punches that can send the
victim clear over
the horizon.

previous.name: Machoke
previous.flavorText:
Its muscular body
is so powerful, it
must wear a power save belt to be
able to regulate
its motions.

next.name: Bellsprout
next.flavorText:
A carnivorous
POKéMON that traps
and eats bugs. It uses its root
feet to soak up
needed moisture.

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.flavorText:
Loves to build
its muscles.
It trains in all styles of martial
arts to become
even stronger.

pokemon.name: Machoke
pokemon.flavorText:
Its muscular body
is so powerful, it
must wear a power save belt to be
able to regulate
its motions.

Using its heavy
